title: Ticket #7808: from_dag() binding should throw exception when .dag file not found
description: The htcondor.Submit.from_dag() python binding outputs an error when the specified .dag file does not exist, but it does not throw an exception. We should change this so it throws a RuntimeError exception, which the user can catch and handle appropriately.
remarks:
2020-Aug-21 08:28:13 by karpel:
Can this be a FileNotFound exception so that its more specific?

2020-Aug-21 10:11:33 by tlmiller:
See #6935 for why the answer is yes. (OK, I just noticed that this ticket is (a) derived from that one and (b) points to the RUST where the user made this request.)

2020-Aug-21 13:39:00 by coatsworth:
Sure, I can rewire this to throw more specific exceptions. It's a bit of extra work because the Python binding is built on the dagman_utils library which is shared with the condor_dagman CLI, but it seems pretty trivial to actually hook this in, so I'll plan on it.
